testcase.name: 01-navigator_getusermedia_supported
testcase.purpose: Objective: Check if Navigator implements NavigatorUserMedia - Description: Check if Navigator implements NavigatorUserMedia

description.pre_condition: Objective: Check if Navigator implements NavigatorUserMedia - Description: Check if Navigator implements NavigatorUserMedia

testcase.name: 02-navigator_audio_getting_datastream
testcase.purpose: Objective: Check if we can access to the user's microphone by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can access to the user's microphone by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

description.pre_condition: Objective: Check if we can access to the user's microphone by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can access to the user's microphone by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

testcase.name: 03-navigator_audio_video_getting_datastream
testcase.purpose: Objective: Check if we can access to local devices (video cameras, microphones, Web cams) that can generate multimedia stream data by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can access to local devices (video cameras, microphones, Web cams) that can generate multimedia stream data by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

description.pre_condition: Objective: Check if we can access to local devices (video cameras, microphones, Web cams) that can generate multimedia stream data by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can access to local devices (video cameras, microphones, Web cams) that can generate multimedia stream data by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

testcase.name: 04-navigator_audio_not_getting_datastream
testcase.purpose: Objective: Check if we can not access to the user's microphone by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can not access to the user's microphone by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

description.pre_condition: Objective: Check if we can not access to the user's microphone by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can not access to the user's microphone by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

testcase.name: 05-navigator_video_getting_datastream
testcase.purpose: Objective: Check if we can access to the user's Web cams or video cameras by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can access to the user's Web cams or video cameras by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

description.pre_condition: Objective: Check if we can access to the user's Web cams or video cameras by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can access to the user's Web cams or video cameras by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

testcase.name: 06-navigator_video_not_getting_datastream
testcase.purpose: Objective: Check if we can not access to the user's Web cams and video cameras by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can not access to the user's Web cams and video cameras by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

description.pre_condition: Objective: Check if we can not access to the user's Web cams and video cameras by calling the API 'getUserMedia' - Description: Check if we can not access to the user's Web cams and video cameras by calling the API 'getUserMedia'

testcase.name: 08-api-present
testcase.purpose: Objective: Test checks for the presence of the navigator.getUserMedia method, taking vendor prefixes into account - Description: Test checks for the presence of the navigator.getUserMedia method, taking vendor prefixes into account

testcase.name: 09-empty-option-param
testcase.purpose: Objective: Test checks that getUserMedia with no value in the options parameter raises a NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR exception - Description: Test checks that getUserMedia with no value in the options parameter raises a NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR exception

description.pre_condition: Objective: Test checks that getUserMedia with no value in the options parameter raises a NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR exception - Description: Test checks that getUserMedia with no value in the options parameter raises a NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR exception

testcase.name: 0A-getusermedia-impossible-constraint
testcase.purpose: Objective: Test checks that setting a trivial mandatory constraint (width >=0) in getUserMedia works - Description: Test checks that setting a trivial mandatory constraint (width >=0) in getUserMedia works

description.pre_condition: Objective: Test checks that setting a trivial mandatory constraint (width >=0) in getUserMedia works - Description: Test checks that setting a trivial mandatory constraint (width >=0) in getUserMedia works

testcase.name: 0B-getusermedia-optional-constraint

testcase.name: 0D-unknownkey-option-param
